title: Where in the USA is this?
description: A daily photo location guessing game.
keywords: location, game, wordle, photos, coordinates, guess
about: Guess the location in the USA in five tries. After each guess a new photo is revealed. The color of the tile shows how close your guess was within:
data: ~500,000 geo-tagged images from Wikimedia Commons. Each day, a random location is generated, along with five photos within five miles.
credit: By Russell Samora. A new puzzle is released daily at midnight, GMT.
support: If you like our work, support us on Patreon, or send us a tip!
